output.dependency: The beer style column (description of the beer) depends on the beer name column (specific beer title) as the style is often defined by the beer's characteristics mentioned in its name.
The numeric identifier column might depend on the serving size column since certain identifiers might correlate with different serving sizes for a brewery's products.
The numeric identifier referencing a batch or listing might relate to the name of the brewery column, indicating that beers with the same identifier are produced by the same brewery.
The city column likely has a dependency on the state column as products are typically distributed from a city to a specific state.
